home.title: Welcome
home.subtitle: Developer, Programmer, UI/UX Designer and Publisher
home.description: My name is Pranav Pandey. I am a professional software developer and a little bit designer from India working on many technologies, especially related to Android.
home.achievement:
● Reverse Engineering Android since 2011.
● Over 10 active open source projects on GitHub.
● Published over 20 apps on Google Play with more than 1M downloads.
● Led the software development of 3 GMS approved Android devices.
● Developed over 5 websites using Polymer, Jekyll, Wordpress and Firebase.
● Deep understanding of Material Design by Google with the ability to design corresponding graphics using Photoshop and Illustrator.
home.quote: Don't be afraid of failures, it makes you more confident!
